name: esx-ds-algo
description: Data Structure and Algorithm with ES X

scripts.test: npm run compile && mocha test --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.watch: npm run compile --watch && mocha test --watch --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.coverage: npm run compile && babel-istanbul cover  ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test --watch --compilers js:babel-core/register -- --dir ./src
